ai-patthana17.1:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.1:0.3_0: moves for feelings, doing good feelings,
ai-patthana17.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana17.1:2.1_2: skillful qualities don’t arise because of a skillful feeling, nor by pleasant feeling, and association with happiness.
ai-patthana17.1:3.1_0: For unprofitable feeling arises dependent on the teaching and training. It doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:3.1_2: For unprofitable feeling, unwholesome thoughts don’t arise for a pleasant feeling, or neutral feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:4.1_0: Not knowing pleasant feeling, painful feeling, or neutral feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:4.1_1: Not knowing pleasant feeling, painful feeling, or neutral feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:4.1_2: Thoughts connected with pleasant feeling, painful feeling, or neutral feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:4.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana17.1:6.0_0: (They are) not visible objects with the object of the objects,
ai-patthana17.1:6.1_0: Not unprofitable feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling. ...
ai-patthana17.1:9.1_0: Not knowing pleasure, pain, and happiness associated with it, it doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:9.1_1: Not knowing pleasant feeling, painful feeling, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:9.1_2: Thoughts connected with pleasant feeling. Their feeling doesn’t associated with pleasant feeling, or neutral feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:9.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana17.1:10.1_0: Neither for the sake of a newly arrived monks, nor do they have nine objects?
ai-patthana17.1:10.1_1: not on the bank of the river ...
ai-patthana17.1:10.1_2: When it is finished, he doesn’t bathe when it is finished; he doesn’t have nine orifices the nine orifices
ai-patthana17.1:13.1_0: At the time of the threshold lifetime, and the haunt of closely roaming and transmigrating, both of the same hithern,
ai-patthana17.1:15.1_1: After doing so, on one another’s work, and three were reborn in the realm of later on building work. ...
ai-patthana17.1:15.1_2: (Then) nineteenth particular periods associated with them ...
ai-patthana17.1:15.1_4: You should get close to a question.
ai-patthana17.1:16.1_0: Unskillful feeling doesn’t give rise to painful feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:16.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana17.1:17.1_0: ‘... for the sake of the five objects.’ ...
ai-patthana17.1:18.1_0: unprofitable feeling doesn’t give rise to painful feeling, or associated with painful feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:18.1_1: unprofitable feeling doesn’t give rise to painful feeling. It doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities with suffering as condition: by painful feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:18.1_2: Though unprofitable feeling, painful feelings don’t arise in a lower realm.
ai-patthana17.1:18.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana17.1:19.1_0: Not for the sake of the sake of three, or for the object,
ai-patthana17.1:19.1_2: Nor through the five constituents (of the First Path), not with the intention in hand, not with the three letter.
ai-patthana17.1:19.1_4: You should get close to a question.
ai-patthana17.1:20.1_0: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a skillful thing. It doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.1:20.1_1: This is the section in brief.
